name: Browserbase
title: browserbase.com
shortDescription: Browserbase is a platform designed to facilitate web browsing for AI agents and applications. It provides a robust infrastructure to manage and monitor headless browsers at scale, allowing developers to focus on building applications without worrying about the underlying browser management. An example use case is a company automating data extraction from web sources using AI, leveraging Browserbase to handle thousands of browser instances seamlessly.
pros: Integration with major frameworks like Playwright
Global browser locations for reduced latency
cons: Costs can escalate with increased usage

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Puppeteer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Direct control over Chrome or Chromium
